dcterms:description: An extensive collection of over 20,000 unique medical terms and 300,000 mentions, each offering context-aware lay definitions manually annotated by domain experts.

dcterms:description: A set of files and software that integrates biomedical terminology to enable interoperability between computer systems.
dcterms:title: UMLS (Unified Medical Language System)

dcterms:description: A medical jargon extraction model that utilizes Wikipedia's hyperlink span and contextualized masked language model score.

dcterms:description: A vocabulary enriched through mining a social Q&A site using a similarity-based approach.

dcterms:description: A natural language processing system that links medical terms in electronic health record notes to lay definitions, developed using physician reviews.
